name: BunnyVerse
description: BunnyVerse ($BNV) is a deflationary Play to earn gaming token on Ethereum network. A cross-chain best gaming experience ever aiming to provide a truly decentralized gaming blockchain as a service with zero fees. BunnyVerse is creating its own blockchain for - cross-chain best gaming experience ever - cross-chain NFTs - cross-chain LaunchPad - cross-chain instant swap"
